00035 class strong_random_generator {

00037     typedef unsigned int result_type;

00055 namespace detail {
00057     struct base_random_generator {
00058         typedef unsigned int result_type;
00059         virtual result_type operator()()=0;
00060     };
00061 
00063     template <class T>
00064     struct random_generator: public base_random_generator {
00065         typedef boost::uniform_int<result_type> dist_t;
00066         typedef boost::variate_generator<T&, dist_t> gen_t;
00067         random_generator(T *g): genobj(g), gen(*g,
00068             dist_t((std::numeric_limits<result_type>::min)(),
00069                 (std::numeric_limits<result_type>::max)())) { }
00070         result_type operator()() { return gen(); }
00071         std::auto_ptr<T> genobj;
00072         gen_t gen;
00073     };
00074 
00076     void set_random_generator(base_random_generator *obj);
00077 
00082     unsigned int get_random();
00083 } // namespace detail
00084 
00086 // Template function definitions
00087 
00101 template <typename T>
00102 void set_random_generator(T *gen) {
00103     detail::random_generator<T> *obj=new detail::random_generator<T>(gen);
00104     detail::set_random_generator(obj);
00105 }
